required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Of Sunitinib Plus FOLFOX In Patients With Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Study Of SU011248 In Combination With Oxaliplatin, Leucovorin, And 5-Fluorouracil In Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This study determined the maximum tolerated dose and safety of SU011248 (sunitinib malate, SUTENT) in combination with FOLFOX [Leucovorin + Fluorouracil (5-FU) + Oxaliplatin]. Three different dosing regimens with starting doses of sunitinib at 37.5 mg/day (Schedule 2/2, Schedule 4/2, and Continuous Dosing) were tested in patients with advanced solid tumors, including colorectal cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: Study Design: Treatment, Single Group Assignment (7 cohorts), Open Label, Non-Randomized, Safety Study.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
primary_outcome.description: All observed or volunteered AEs and SAEs regardless of treatment group or suspected causal relationship to the investigational product(s) were reported.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of treatment until Day 8 of Cycles 4 and 8 (2/2 Schedule), Day 8 of Cycles 3 and 6 (4/2 Schedule), and Day 1 of Cycles 3 and 7 (Continuous Dosing)
secondary_outcome.description: From the start of treatment until disease progression/recurrence. OR=confirmed Complete Response (CR) or confirmed Partial Response (PR) according to Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST). CR = disappearance of all target lesions. CR was confirmed if it persisted on repeat imaging study ≥ 4 weeks after initial documentation of response. PR = ≥ 30% decrease in the sum of the longest dimensions of the target lesions taking as a reference the baseline sum longest dimensions. PR was confirmed if it persisted on repeat imaging study ≥ 4 weeks after initial documentation of response.
Drug clearance (CL/F) = dose divided by area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero to twenty-four hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under Plasma Concentration-Time Profile From Time Zero to Twenty-Four Hours Postdose (AUC24) of Sunitinib
secondary_outcome.description: AUC24 = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to twenty-four hours. AUC24 was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.
t1/2 = terminal phase half-life. t1/2 was obtained by natural log of 2 (ln2) divided by the rate constant for terminal phase (kel).
AUC24 = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to twenty-four hours. AUC24 was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.
CL/F = dose divided by area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero to twenty-four hours.
t1/2 = terminal phase half-life. t1/2 was obtained by ln2 divided by kel.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free platinum was measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free platinum was measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Profile From Time Zero to Infinity (AUCinf) for Free Platinum
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free platinum was measured. AUCinf = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to infinity. AUCinf was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2 = terminal phase half-life. t1/2 was obtained by ln2 divided by kel. Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free platinum was measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and total platinum was measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and total platinum was measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Profile From Time Zero to Forty-Eight Hours (AUC48) for Total Platinum
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and total platinum was measured. AUC48 = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to forty-eight hours. AUC48 was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: Steady state is reached when the amount of drug getting into the system per unit time is equal to the amount of drug cleared from the system.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: CLss was determined by total amount of drug received during infusion or duration of infusion (Ki) divided by Css.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: T1/2 of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2 = terminal phase half-life. t1/2 was obtained by ln2 divided by kel. Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free and total platinum were measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: CL/F of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
secondary_outcome.description: CL/F = dose divided by area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero to twenty-four hours.

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmin of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
Volume Endothelial Transfer Constant (Ktrans) of Tumors in a Selected Group of Subjects Assessed by Dynamic Contrast-Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Imaging (DCE-MRI)
secondary_outcome.description: Volume endothelial Ktrans was estimated by fitting the tissue contrast agent time course to the Kety equation (Tofts model for analysis of DCE-MRI data).

secondary_outcome.measure: Initial Area Dnder the Contrast Agent Concentration-Time Curve (IAUC) of Tumors in a Selected Group of Subjects Assessed by DCE-MRI
secondary_outcome.description: IAUC: The initial area under the curve was estimated by integrating the area under the contrast agent concentration time course for the first 90 seconds after bolus arrival in the tumor.

arm_group.description: SU011248 [sunitinib] in combination with FOLFOX; FOLFOX is a chemotherapy regimen that combines oxaliplatin and leucovorin with bolus and infusion 5-FU. The modified FOLFOX 6 (mFOLFOX6) regimen is one of several different regimens of FOLFOX used in clinic, according to different dosages of the 4 drugs. mFOLFOX6 was administered every 2 weeks on Days 1 and 2 of each cycle. 25, 37.5 and 50 mg/day, oral, administered on an outpatient basis in three different dosing regimens: schedule 2/2 (2 weeks on, 2 weeks off), schedule 4/2 (4 weeks on, 2 weeks off), and continuous daily dosing (every day); FOLFOX will be administered every 2 weeks, using the modified FOLFOX 6 (mFOLFOX6) regimen, consisting of: oxaliplatin 85 mg/m2 + leucovorin 400 mg/m2 as a 2-hr IV infusion; 5-FU 400 mg/m2 IV bolus, followed by - 5-FU 2400 mg/m2 as a 46-hr IV infusion

intervention.description: 50 mg sunitinib + modified FOLFOX6 ( CRC, only Schedule 2/2)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Advanced solid tumor malignancy (during expansion at the maximum tolerated dose, entry will be limited to patients wtih adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum)
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) 0 or 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Prior treatment with more than 6 cycles of traditional alkylating agent-based chemotherapy regimens
- Prior treatment with more than 2 cycles of carboplating-based chemotherapy regimens
- For colorectal cancer patients in the expanded cohorts, prior treatment with more than 2 systemic chemotherapy regimens in the metastatic setting

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 2/2)
group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week off period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 50 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 2/2)
group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week off period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 50 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (CRC Only, Schedule 2/2)
group.description: CRC = colorectal cancer. Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week off period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 4/2)
group.description: Schedule 4/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 4 weeks followed by a 2-week off period, overlapping with 3 cycles of modified FOLFOX6

group.title: 50 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 4/2)
group.description: Schedule 4/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 4 weeks followed by a 2-week off period, overlapping with 3 cycles of modified FOLFOX6

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Continuous Dosing)
group.description: Continuous Dosing = Sunitinib administered daily for 16 weeks. Off periods and dosage depended on toxicities observed. Sunitinib was administered with modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 25 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Continuous Dosing)
group.description: Continuous Dosing = Sunitinib administered daily for 16 weeks. Off periods and dosage depended on toxicities observed. Sunitinib was administered with modified FOLFOX6.

outcome.title: Number of Subjects With Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
outcome.description: All observed or volunteered AEs and SAEs regardless of treatment group or suspected causal relationship to the investigational product(s) were reported.
outcome.population: Intent to treat (ITT) = all subjects enrolled in the study that received at least one dose of study medication. Subjects who did not complete the follow-up period for dose limiting toxicity assessment because of death from progressive disease or other non-treatment related events were replaced.

outcome.title: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Profile From Time Zero to Infinity (AUCinf) for Free Platinum
outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free platinum was measured. AUCinf = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to infinity. AUCinf was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

outcome.title: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Profile From Time Zero to Forty-Eight Hours (AUC48) for Total Platinum
outcome.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and total platinum was measured. AUC48 = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to forty-eight hours. AUC48 was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

measure.title: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Profile From Time Zero to Forty-Eight Hours (AUC48) for Total Platinum
measure.description: Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and total platinum was measured. AUC48 = Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero (pre-dose) to forty-eight hours. AUC48 was obtained by the Linear/Log trapezoidal method.
measure.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

outcome.title: Steady State Concentration (Css) of Fluorouracil (5-FU)
outcome.description: Steady state is reached when the amount of drug getting into the system per unit time is equal to the amount of drug cleared from the system.
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 2/2)
group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 50 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 2/2)
group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

measure.title: Steady State Concentration (Css) of Fluorouracil (5-FU)
measure.description: Steady state is reached when the amount of drug getting into the system per unit time is equal to the amount of drug cleared from the system.
measure.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

outcome.title: Steady State Clearance (CLss) of 5-FU
outcome.description: CLss was determined by total amount of drug received during infusion or duration of infusion (Ki) divided by Css.
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 2/2)
group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

measure.title: Steady State Clearance (CLss) of 5-FU
measure.description: CLss was determined by total amount of drug received during infusion or duration of infusion (Ki) divided by Css.
measure.population: ITT population of subjects who had completed PK blood sampling for at least one day.

outcome.title: Area Under the Curve (AUC) of 5-FU
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: AUC for 5-FU was not calculated.

outcome.title: T1/2 of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
outcome.description: t1/2 = terminal phase half-life. t1/2 was obtained by ln2 divided by kel. Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free and total platinum were measured.
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: T1/2 was not calculated for Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU.

group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

measure.title: T1/2 of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
measure.description: t1/2 = terminal phase half-life. t1/2 was obtained by ln2 divided by kel. Oxaliplatin was metabolized to platinum and free and total platinum were measured.
measure.population: T1/2 was not calculated for Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU.

outcome.title: CL/F of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
outcome.description: CL/F = dose divided by area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero to twenty-four hours.
outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 1h, 2h, 2 h 5 min, 2h 15 min, 2h 30 min, 2h 45 min, 4h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 24h, and 48h post-dose
outcome.population: CL/F was not calculated for Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU.

measure.title: CL/F of Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU
measure.description: CL/F = dose divided by area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time zero to twenty-four hours.
measure.population: CL/F was not calculated for Free Platinum, Total Platinum, and 5-FU.

outcome.title: Volume Endothelial Transfer Constant (Ktrans) of Tumors in a Selected Group of Subjects Assessed by Dynamic Contrast-Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Imaging (DCE-MRI)
outcome.description: Volume endothelial Ktrans was estimated by fitting the tissue contrast agent time course to the Kety equation (Tofts model for analysis of DCE-MRI data).
outcome.population: No pharmacodynamic assessments were performed due to limited number of DCE-MRI scans collected.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 2/2)
group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 50 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (CRC Only, Schedule 2/2)
group.description: CRC = colorectal cancer. Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 4/2)
group.description: Schedule 4/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 4 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period, overlapping with 3 cycles of modified FOLFOX6

group.title: 50 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Schedule 4/2)
group.description: Schedule 4/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 4 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period, overlapping with 3 cycles of modified FOLFOX6

measure.title: Volume Endothelial Transfer Constant (Ktrans) of Tumors in a Selected Group of Subjects Assessed by Dynamic Contrast-Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Imaging (DCE-MRI)
measure.description: Volume endothelial Ktrans was estimated by fitting the tissue contrast agent time course to the Kety equation (Tofts model for analysis of DCE-MRI data).
measure.population: No pharmacodynamic assessments were performed due to limited number of DCE-MRI scans collected.

outcome.title: Initial Area Dnder the Contrast Agent Concentration-Time Curve (IAUC) of Tumors in a Selected Group of Subjects Assessed by DCE-MRI
outcome.description: IAUC: The initial area under the curve was estimated by integrating the area under the contrast agent concentration time course for the first 90 seconds after bolus arrival in the tumor.
outcome.population: No pharmacodynamic assessments were performed due to limited number of DCE-MRI scans collected.

group.description: Schedule 2/2 = Sunitinib administered daily for 2 weeks followed by a 2-week rest period. Sunitinib was administered during every other cycle of modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 37.5 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Continuous Dosing)
group.description: Continuous Dosing = Sunitinib administered daily for 16 weeks. Off periods and dosage depended on toxicities observed. Sunitinib was administered with modified FOLFOX6.

group.title: 25 mg Sunitinib + Modified FOLFOX6 (Continuous Dosing)
group.description: Continuous Dosing = Sunitinib administered daily for 16 weeks. Off periods and dosage depended on toxicities observed. Sunitinib was administered with modified FOLFOX6.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Pfizer has the right to review disclosures, requesting a delay of < 60 days. Investigator will postpone single center publications until after disclosure of pooled data (all sites), < 12 months from study completion/termination at all participating sites. Investigator may not disclose previously undisclosed confidential information other than study results.
